item.title: è®°ä¸€æ¬¡å¤šæ•°æ®æºåˆ‡æ¢å¤±æ•ˆé—®é¢˜
item.description: äº‹æ•…ç°åœº ### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00933: SQL command not properly ended ### The error may exist in class path resource [mappers/scm/NCMapper.xml] ### The error may involve defaultParameterMap ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: select name,code from bd_customer where name like '%%' LIMIT ? ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00933: SQL command not properly ended ; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00933: SQL command not properly ended at org.
